verses.verse: <S%G1161><s%> Him that is <S%G770>weak<s%> in <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4102>faith<s%> <S%G4355>receive<s%> ye, but <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G1261>doubtful<s%> <S%G1253>disputations.<s%>

For <S%G3739>one<s%> <S%G3303><s%> <S%G4100>believeth<s%> that he may <S%G5315>eat<s%> all <S%G3956>things:<s%> <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3588>another,<s%> who is <S%G770>weak,<s%> <S%G2068>eateth<s%> <S%G3001>herbs.<s%>

Let <S%G3361>not<s%> him that <S%G2068>eateth<s%> <S%G1848>despise<s%> him that eateth <S%G2068>not;<s%> <S%G3361><s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> let <S%G3361>not<s%> him which eateth <S%G2068>not<s%> <S%G3361><s%> <S%G2919>judge<s%> him that <S%G2068>eateth:<s%> <S%G1063>for<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> hath <S%G4355>received<s%> <S%G846>him.<s%>

Who <S%G5101><s%> <S%G1488>art<s%> <S%G4771>thou<s%> that <S%G2919>judgest<s%> another <S%G245>man's<s%> <S%G3610>servant?<s%> to his <S%G2398>own<s%> <S%G2962>master<s%> he <S%G4739>standeth<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G4098>falleth.<s%> <S%G1161>Yea,<s%> he shall be holden <S%G2476>up:<s%> <S%G1063>for<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G1415>able<s%> to make him <S%G2476>stand.<s%> <S%G846><s%>

One <S%G3739>man<s%> <S%G3303><s%> <S%G2919>esteemeth<s%> one day above <S%G2250>another:<s%> <S%G3844><s%> <S%G2250><s%> <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3739>another<s%> <S%G2919>esteemeth<s%> <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G2250>day<s%> alike. Let every <S%G1538>man<s%> be fully <S%G4135>persuaded<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> his <S%G2398>own<s%> <S%G3563>mind.<s%>

He that <S%G5426>regardeth<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2250>day,<s%> <S%G5426>regardeth<s%> it unto the <S%G2962>Lord;<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> he that regardeth <S%G5426>not<s%> <S%G3361><s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2250>day,<s%> to the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> he doth <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G5426>regard<s%> it. He that <S%G2068>eateth,<s%> <S%G2068>eateth<s%> to the <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> <S%G1063>for<s%> he giveth God <S%G2168>thanks;<s%> <S%G2316><s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> he that eateth <S%G2068>not<s%> <S%G3361><s%> to the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> he <S%G2068>eateth<s%> <S%G3756>not,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> giveth God <S%G2168>thanks.<s%> <S%G2316><s%>
For <S%G1063><s%> <S%G3762>none<s%> of <S%G2257>us<s%> <S%G2198>liveth<s%> to <S%G1438>himself,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> no <S%G3762>man<s%> <S%G599>dieth<s%> to <S%G1438>himself.<s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> <S%G1437>whether<s%> <S%G5037>we<s%> <S%G2198>live,<s%> we <S%G2198>live<s%> unto <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2962>Lord;<s%> <S%G5037>and<s%> <S%G1437>whether<s%> we <S%G599>die,<s%> we <S%G599>die<s%> unto <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2962>Lord:<s%> <S%G5037><s%> <S%G1437>whether<s%> we <S%G2198>live<s%> <S%G3767>therefore,<s%> <S%G5037>or<s%> <S%G1437><s%> <S%G599>die,<s%> we <S%G2070>are<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2962>Lord's.<s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> this <S%G5124>end<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2532>both<s%> <S%G599>died,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G450>rose,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G326>revived,<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> he might be <S%G2961>Lord<s%> <S%G2532>both<s%> of the <S%G3498>dead<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2198>living.<s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> <S%G5101>why<s%> dost <S%G4771>thou<s%> <S%G2919>judge<s%> <S%G4675>thy<s%> <S%G80>brother?<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G2532><s%> <S%G5101>why<s%> dost <S%G4771>thou<s%> set at <S%G1848>naught<s%> <S%G4675>thy<s%> <S%G80>brother?<s%> <S%G1063>for<s%> we shall <S%G3956>all<s%> stand <S%G3936>before<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> judgment <S%G968>seat<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ.<s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> it is <S%G1125>written,<s%> As <S%G1473>I<s%> <S%G2198>live,<s%> <S%G3004>saith<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> <S%G3754><s%> <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G1119>knee<s%> shall <S%G2578>bow<s%> to <S%G1698>me,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G1100>tongue<s%> shall <S%G1843>confess<s%> to <S%G2316>God.<s%>
So <S%G686><s%> <S%G3767>then<s%> every <S%G1538>one<s%> of <S%G2257>us<s%> shall <S%G1325>give<s%> <S%G3056>account<s%> <S%G4012>of<s%> <S%G1438>himself<s%> to <S%G2316>God.<s%>

Let us not therefore <S%G2919>judge<s%> <S%G3767><s%> one <S%G240>another<s%> any <S%G3371>more:<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G2919>judge<s%> <S%G5124>this<s%> <S%G3123>rather,<s%> that no <S%G3361>man<s%> <S%G5087>put<s%> a <S%G4348>stumblingblock<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> an occasion to <S%G4625>fall<s%> in his <S%G80>brother's<s%> way.

I <S%G1492>know,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> am <S%G3982>persuaded<s%> <S%G1722>by<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> there is <S%G3762>nothing<s%> <S%G2839>unclean<s%> <S%G1223>of<s%> <S%G1438>itself:<s%> <S%G1508>but<s%> to him that <S%G3049>esteemeth<s%> any <S%G5100>thing<s%> to <S%G1511>be<s%> <S%G2839>unclean,<s%> to <S%G1565>him<s%> it is <S%G2839>unclean.<s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> <S%G4675>thy<s%> <S%G80>brother<s%> be <S%G3076>grieved<s%> <S%G1223>with<s%> thy <S%G1033>meat,<s%> now walkest thou <S%G3765>not<s%> <S%G4043><s%> <S%G2596>charitably.<s%> <S%G26><s%> <S%G622>Destroy<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G1565>him<s%> with <S%G4675>thy<s%> <S%G1033>meat,<s%> <S%G5228>for<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G599>died.<s%>
Let <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G3767>then<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G18>good<s%> be evil spoken of: <S%G987><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G932>kingdom<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G1035>meat<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4213>drink;<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G1343>righteousness,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1515>peace,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5479>joy<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Ghost.<s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> he that <S%G1722>in<s%> these <S%G5125>things<s%> <S%G1398>serveth<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> is <S%G2101>acceptable<s%> to <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1384>approved<s%> of <S%G444>men.<s%>

<S%G686><s%> Let us therefore follow <S%G1377>after<s%> <S%G3767><s%> the <S%G3588>things<s%> which make for <S%G1515>peace,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3588>things<s%> wherewith one may <S%G3619>edify<s%> <S%G1519><s%> <S%G240>another.<s%>

For <S%G1752><s%> <S%G1033>meat<s%> <S%G2647>destroy<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2041>work<s%> of <S%G2316>God.<s%> All <S%G3956>things<s%> <S%G3303>indeed<s%> are <S%G2513>pure;<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> it is <S%G2556>evil<s%> for that <S%G444>man<s%> who <S%G2068>eateth<s%> <S%G1223>with<s%> <S%G4348>offense.<s%>

It is <S%G2570>good<s%> <S%G3361>neither<s%> to <S%G5315>eat<s%> <S%G2907>flesh,<s%> <S%G3366>nor<s%> to <S%G4095>drink<s%> <S%G3631>wine,<s%> <S%G3366>nor<s%> any thing <S%G1722>whereby<s%> <S%G3739><s%> <S%G4675>thy<s%> <S%G80>brother<s%> <S%G4350>stumbleth,<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> is <S%G4624>offended,<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> is made <S%G770>weak.<s%>

Hast <S%G2192><s%> <S%G4771>thou<s%> <S%G4102>faith?<s%> <S%G2192>have<s%> it <S%G2596>to<s%> <S%G4572>thyself<s%> <S%G1799>before<s%> <S%G2316>God.<s%> <S%G3107>Happy<s%> is he that <S%G2919>condemneth<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G1438>himself<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> that thing <S%G3739>which<s%> he <S%G1381>alloweth.<s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> he that <S%G1252>doubteth<s%> is <S%G2632>damned<s%> <S%G1437>if<s%> he <S%G5315>eat,<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> he eateth <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G4102>faith:<s%> <S%G1161>for<s%> <S%G3956>whatsoever<s%> <S%G3739><s%> is <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G4102>faith<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G266>sin.<s%>
